title: Losing connection randomly in lobby/ Not able to login
body:
Id be in a lobby getting ready to play, and all of a sudden it would say; Trying to reconnect.
or even sometimes it wont even let me into the game when i log on and input all my credentials. It would sit there happily loading for about 10 mins then tell me I've lost connection Try again or look at the support page. 
I can't get into a game or the game will crash and it wont start back up. working fine this morning. then after that around 11:02am this started.
We also go a new modem we installed and the internet has been slower then ever. Could the modem be the problem? If so how can i configure my modem  to work better with the internet and games? {{champion:58}}

replies.body:
Since you're having general speed issues with your new modem, I'd strongly recommend either rebooting it (pull power for 60 secs) or contact your ISP (if they provided it) so they can troubleshoot it to determine if it's a dud.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

So i did call my (ISP) and upgraded the MB of my upload speed and download speed(Great) But still the same connection problems. Every day i get home to play i get on login and as soon as i log in it will try to reconnect, Reconnect, then disconnect me and Exit the Client. I have no ideal why this is happening.

You mentioned your issues started after getting your new modem. Did you bring those concerns up to your ISP when you contacted them? Upgrading your speed is awesome, but it doesn't help is troubleshoot the situation at hand, unfortunately.
I have had the same problem 2 of my last 4 games. I have never ever had problems before. I reinstalled my internet connection (Not the proper wording), and did the repair tool in the client.
